biogHist.abstract:
Ros Bowden, interviewer and broadcaster with the Australian Broadcasting Corporation, worked in the Radio National Social History Unit and on the 'Coming Out Show'.
Between 1977 and 1989 she conducted interviews for various radio programmes broadcast on the ABC.

resourceRelation.relationEntry: 'Bowden, Ros', in The Australian Women's Register, National Foundation for Australian Women and The University of Melbourne
Book: Women of The Land: Stories of Australia's Rural Women as told to Ros Bowden

bibref.name: Bowden, Ros
bibref.title: Women of The Land: Stories of Australia's Rural Women as told to Ros Bowden

resourceRelation.relationEntry: Ros Bowden - interviews conducted for radio programmes and documentaries, ca.1975 - 1989

archref.repository: Mitchell and Dixson Libraries Manuscripts Collection, State Library of New South Wales
archref.unittitle: Ros Bowden - interviews conducted for radio programmes and documentaries, ca.1975 - 1989
archref.abstract: Collection comprises - 78 reels and 90 cassettes - 100hrs. Subjects include Aborigines, Australian -- Children -- Northern Territory. Aborigines, Australian -- Missions -- South Australia. Antarctica -- Discovery and exploration. Hiking -- New South Wales. Women -- Employment -- Australia. Women -- Social conditions. Women agricultural laborers -- Australia. Women air pilots, Australian -- 20th century. World War, 1939-1945 -- Social aspects -- Australia. World War, 1939-1945 -- War work. World War, 1939-1945 -- Women -- Australia

resourceRelation.relationEntry: Ros Bowden - interviews with people who knew Ida Leeson, former Mitchell Librarian, 1985

archref.repository: Mitchell and Dixson Libraries Manuscripts Collection, State Library of New South Wales
archref.unittitle: Ros Bowden - interviews with people who knew Ida Leeson, former Mitchell Librarian, 1985
archref.abstract: Collection comprises - 5 cassettes - 4hrs 30mins. Interviews with: Arnot, Jean Fleming, 1903-1995 Conlon, T.J. (Telford James), 1941- Conlon, Wilma Dix, A. T. (Alexander Thomas), 1927- Gollan, Daphne Kerr, John, Sir, 1914-1991 Phelan, Nancy, 1913-
